original_text: And Moses said unto him, As soon as I am gone out of the city, I will spread abroad my hands unto the Lord; and the thunder shall cease, neither shall there be any more hail; that thou mayest know how that the earth is the Lord's.
korean_text: 모세가 그에게 이르되 내가 성에서 나가서 곧 내 손을 여호와를 향하여 펴리니 그리하면 우렛소리가 그치고 우박이 다시 있지 아니할지라 세상이 여호와께 속한 줄을 왕이 알리이다

sentences.original_text: As soon as I am gone out of the city
I will spread abroad my hands unto the Lord
neither shall there be any more hail
how that the earth is the Lord's
